channel.title: [RS2][UPDATED] Bone picker and burier :: CAN RUN FOR EVER!
channel.description:
My awesome bone picker and burier... REVAMPED! If it dies, it will walk back to the chicken coop and start again! The longest test so far was 2 hours before it got leo.
Its now much faster than ever, has "lost" (teleport) features, and is generally much better.
http://cardiffhigh.cardiff.sch.uk/~jamie.sargant/Owen/boneman71.scar
Enjoy!

item.title: [RS2][UPDATED] Bone picker and burier :: CAN RUN FOR EVER!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“MrPink, post:53, topic:9727”]Line 473: [Error] (14819:1): Unknown identifier ‘AntiBan’ in script C:\Documents and Settings\Daniel\Desktop\Scar\boneman71.scar

any1 know wots wrong?[/quote]

It’s an old script. It probably won’t work any more.

Look, you can see from the date:

[RS2][UPDATED] Bone picker and burier :: CAN RUN FOR EVER!!!
« on: August 16, 2006, 17:45:55 »

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][UPDATED] Bone picker and burier :: CAN RUN FOR EVER!
item.dc:creator: @SturmxHawke SturmxHawke
item.description:
@SturmxHawke wrote:

Maybe it’s because u guys run it without saving it first, look, it’s in the ‘Temporary Internet Files’ map. That means that you just use it but don’t save it, paste the script in SCAR, save the script somewhere and then run it. Maybe that works.

Read full topic

@eggi4792 wrote:

Failed when compiling Line 474: [Error] (14820:1): Unknown identifier 'AntiBan' in script C:\Documents and Settings\Ash Thomas.PC464228543220\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\3PFSOKZS\boneman71[1].scar

Did anyone else get this and does anyone know how to fix it?
